alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 8:22PM MDT until June 23 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... East central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 822 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Grindstone, or 16 miles west of Philip, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grindstone around 835 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grindstone Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.
